sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { FormGroup, FormControl, InputLabel, Input, FormHelperText, Button } from '@material-ui/core'; function SignUp (props:any) { const [username, setUsername] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const [jwt, setJwt] = useState('') const { history } = props const handleSubmit = (event:any) => { axios({ url: '/auth/signup', method: 'POST', data: { 'username': username, 'password': password } }) .then(res => setJwt(res.data)) .finally(() => history.push('/1')) } localStorage.setItem('Jwt', jwt) return (
Username setUsername(event.target.value)} /> We'll never share your credentials. Password setPassword(event.target.value)} /> Make your password unique Password Confirmation Passwords must match
Already have an account? Sign in here!
Go to page 1
Go to page 2
) } export default SignUp
